name: Nelson K.
review: Just wanted to say thank you for putting together a really great platform that is not only easy to use but gives us traders the option of choosing  through some really great signal providers while being customizable as well.

name: Krzysztof Z.
review: I have used several crypto bots and I need to say that the difference against other platforms I've encountered, it's their level of support, responsiveness and customer service, which is very critical for a trader. keep up the great job!

name: Jean Simon
review: I can easily automate my TradingView strategies and remove the time-consuming task of placing my trades manually. Automatic trading is so easy, I love it! Great team, great support, and a great community! Can't wait to see what they've got coming for us in the future!

name: Hendrik van Beek
review: I was having trouble setting up my account, but David was really helpful and he took his time to help me out and gave me in-depth information.

name: Felipe M.
review: I would be lost without Zignaly. If you want to get a real return of investment and always ready to help support - Zignaly's got you covered.

name: Ranjit H.
review: I usually don't write reviews, but hey thanks for creating such a thing. Great team behind this platform. Cheers!

name: Jordi S.
review: I tried a lot of trading platforms but nothing beats Zignaly. I just loved it! I've a small issue while connecting exchange but they support service helped me in 24 hours I was able to be back to trade.

name: Joel Rodr√≠guez
review: I opened a Zignaly account 6 months ago, just before crypto prices crashed. Interface is reasonably easy to get used to, would recommend to someone thinking of starting investments.

name: Mason Alvarez
review: Best trading platform in crypto world. Fast copy trading feature and customer service so fast respawn.

name: Pawel Nowak
review: I like this Zignaly, been using it since 1 year and no problems so far! also they improve the platform every time, adding new features and now they even provide their own exchange.
